home.checkEmail: Check email for a verification code.
home.checkSpam: If you don't see a code in your inbox, check your spam folder. If it's not there, the email address may not be confirmed, or it may not match an existing MusHunter account.
home.weSendCode: We’ll send a verification code to this email if it matches an existing MusHunter account
home.secureAccount: To secure your account, choose a strong password you haven’t used before and is at least 8 characters long.

validation.correctEmail: Email can only contain Latin letters, numbers, “.”, “-”, “_” and “@” signs.
validation.minValue: The field must contain at least 8 characters
validation.onlyLatinSymbols: The field must contain Latin letters
validation.latinNumberSymbol: Only Latin letters, numbers and special characters

success.sendVerifyEmail: Confirmation email sent! Check your email.
